question: Enzyme that can be traced in semen sample of 8 - 10 weeks is:
exp: Spermatozoa contains high concentration of creatine phosphokinase which is more than double then found in any other body fluid the enzyme is stable and can be demonstrated even in old stains of 6 months.

question: Gastric lavage is allowed in which corrosive poisoning?
exp: Gastric lavage is contraindicated in corrosives except phenol and lysol in which gastric lavage can be done because they thicken the membrane and maintain leathery consistency. Gastric lavage is absolutely contraindicated in following condition Corrosive (except phenol & lysol) Convulsant patient Comatose patient Kerosene poisoning

question: Maximum duration within which a consumer should initiate dispute case?
exp: According to consumer protection act there is a limitation period to which a plaintiff can file a case within 2 years. Beyond two years he is not eligible to file a case against the public and government service officials.
